revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNDR4700 |revision=(CENTRIA) |upc=606449082944 |asin=B0092ML8QW |fcc_date=08/13/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=wireless router,NAS |fcc_id=PY311400179 |ic_id=4054A-11400179 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Applied Micro |cpu1_model=APM82181 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SATA, SD Card slot |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9381 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9380 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB3.0 Host Controller;Renasas;D720202;;1; ,,, PCIe Expansion Switch;IDT;89HPES4T4;;1; |flags=fan, DFS |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.11;OpenWrt-deriv; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX, NETGEARXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,, ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=20:E5:2A |oui_eth=20:E5:2A }} {{TagLine|Netgear WNDR4700 CENTRIA}} :[http://www.netgear.com/wndr4700 Product page]
This FCC ID covers two devices... * WNDR4700 - no hard drive included * WNDR4720 - 2.0 TB hard drive included
Per the FCC docs.. * "2976387504" is silkscreened on the board. * The CPU is part APM82181-SKE1000T ([http://www.apm.com/products/embedded/singlecore460/apm82181/ ''Applied Micro'' APM82181 PPage]). * There is an ''IDT'' PCIe switch (89HPES4T4) on-board. * It is shown with three possible HDD brands, one ''Seagate'', one ''Toshiba'', :and one ''Western Digital'' - each 2.0TB in size. * The HDD is only included w/ [[Netgear_WNDR4720|WNDR4720]], [[Netgear_WNDR4700|WNDR4700]] is sold diskless.
{{WiFiCert|WFA18814|03/18/2013}}
===Reviews=== *[http://vr-zone.com/articles/netgear-wndr4700-centria-review/19209.html 'Netgear WNDR4700'' on '''VR-Zone'''] (w/ internal images and chip P/Ns) :Per the VR-Zone review, the device is using... :*''Applied Micro'' APM82181 @1GHz PowerPC SoC :*[[Atheros]] AR9381 for the 2.4GHz radio :*[[Atheros]] AR9380 for the 5GHz radio :*''[[Renesas]]'' (prev. ''[[NEC]]'') D720202 USB 3.0 host controller :*[[Atheros]] AR8327N for the GbE Switch *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31882-first-look-netgear-wndr4700-centria ''First look Netgear WNDR4700'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31894-netgear-wndr4700-centria-reviewed ''Netgear WNDR4700'' review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/154-netgear-wndr4700.html ''Netgear WNDR4700'' review on '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) *[http://www.foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/96-netgear-wndr4700 ''Netgear WNDR4700'' review on '''FoxNetLab'''] (EN) *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/article/42638/Review-of-NETGEAR-s-Centria-WNDR4700-WNDR4720-All-In-One-Wireless-Router/ ''Netgear WNDR4700'' Review on '''MyOpenRouter'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/netgear-wndr4700.shtml ''Netgear WNDR4700'' Review on '''iXBT'''] (RU)
===Wikis=== * {{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wndr4700_v1}}, {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wndr4700}} :"2976387505" is silkscreened on the board :20:E5:2A OUIs, '''NETGEARXX''' and '''NETGEARXX-5G''' :(numeric '''XX''') default SSID patterns :PCI IDs include... :4x 111d:803a (''IDT'' PES4T4), 168c:0030 (AR938xx), 168c:0033 (AR958x), :1912:0015 (''[[Renesas]]'' Âµpd720202) indicating that one each of AR938x and :AR958x series WiFi chips are being used with at least this particular device
